column5: The Walker Room is furnished with a king bed.The room has free Wi-Fi available as well as a flat screen HD-TV. You may wrap yourself in comfort with the spa robes you will find in the closet. An iron and ironing board is also in the room for your convenience. Adjacent is a sitting room with a daybed that will sleep one. There is a private in-room bath with thick Turkish towels and toiletries, hair dryer and make-up mirror. This room can sleep up to 3 people. This room is popular with families.
